row.Name: Generic Message
row.Description: Any non-specific message to a user

row.Name: Profile Actitity
row.Description: Message notifying a user that something has occurred on her/his profile.

row.Name: Bounty Expired
row.Description: Message notifying a user that her/his bounty question has been expired by the system.

row.Name: Bounty Expires In One Day
row.Description: Message notifying a user that her/his bounty question will be expired within the next day.

row.Name: Badge Notification
row.Description: Message notifying a user that he/she has been granted a new badge.

row.Name: Bounty Expires In Three Days
row.Description: Message notifying a user that her/his bounty question will be expired within three days.

row.Name: Rep Bonus Notification
row.Description: Message notifying a user that he/she received a rep bonus.

row.Name: Account Association Prompt
row.Description: Message informing a usually-newly registered user that he/she can associate accounts across sites.

row.Name: Inform Moderator About Post
row.Description: Message to site mods about incorrect behavior on a post - will be inserted into ModeratorMessages.

row.Name: Upgrade Notice
row.Description: Message to site admins that the site has been upgraded.
